# Sample Rate Conversion Complexity Identifiers

**API Collection**

Specifiers for the sample rate conversion algorithm, used for the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity] property.

## Constants

- **kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity_Linear**: Specifies linear interpolation for sample rate conversion. This provides the lowest quality and is, computationally, the least expensive option.
- **kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity_Normal**: Specifies the normal-complexity sample rate conversion algorithm. This is the default value.
- **kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity_Mastering**: Specifies a mastering-quality sample rate conversion algorithm. This provides the highest quality and is, computationally, the most expensive option.
- **kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity_MinimumPhase**

## Constants

- **Audio Converter Properties**: Audio converter properties, used with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioConverterGetPropertyInfo(_:_:_:_:)], [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioConverterGetProperty(_:_:_:_:)], and [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioConverterSetProperty(_:_:_:_:)] functions.
- **Converter Priming Constants**: Constants used with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioConverterPrimeMethod] property.
- **Sample Rate Conversion Quality Identifiers**: Specifiers for sample rate conversion quality, used for the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterQuality] property.
